quote: "I have what it takes! Whether or not you do is irrelevant, because I do!"
"'Kay, I don't know how to talk to you."

"You know something? I really hate people. They're selfish, ignorant, loud, obnoxious pricks with basically no redeeming qualities whatsoever. I mean, really, look at all they've achieved! Genocide, global warming, reality TV, just a never-ending parade of failures and fuck-ups! They are, without question, a complete *write-off* as a species, and *how dare you make me care about them?!*"

"Alright, now that I have your ears, as well as your spines, allow me to indulge myself for a moment and tell you what every content creator has always wanted to say to their audience: *FUCK! ALL Y'ALL!*"
"A bitter experience here and there is nothing I can't handle!"
"I have no idea what I'm doing; I'm just really good at getting lucky."
"Some dreams won't come true on their own! You have to make them come true!"
"Milk is always white, whenever and wherever! Even in the arena! And so am I!"
